resources.string: Discovering Valetudo instances on your networkâ€¦

Troubleshooting: 
 
- Are you connected to your Wi-Fi? 
- Are you running Valetudo 2021.07.0 or newer? 
- Are you connected to a VPN? 
- Does your network setup block/filter mDNS/Bonjour?
You need to manually connect your phone to the Wi-Fi Access Point of your robot for the scan button to work.

This Wizard will help you join a Valetudo-enabled Robot to your Wi-Fi network.

Please note that this will _not_ install Valetudo.
You will need a robot that already has Valetudo installed for this to do anything useful.

You can either use the App to connect to the Robots Wi-Fi Access Point or skip the procedure and use your phones system settings to connect.\n\nNote that using the App to connect to the AP requires the location permission, because Android doesn\'t allow access to Wifi Network scanning without it.
No SSIDs matching known robot APs found.\nTry pressing scan to refresh
No Valetudo found on this Network.\nTry pressing scan to refresh
